scenes.background: After expressing doubt in Monicas ability to manage, Bob pulls you aside and says:
scenes.description: You know, that was kind of harsh. Monica really needed support, not criticism.

options.text: I didn't mean to be harsh. Let's see how we can support her better.
options.analysis: You acknowledged Bob's feedback and expressed willingness to support Monica, showing strong perception and empathy.

options.text: I understand, but she needs to learn to handle these tasks.
options.analysis: You justified your stance while acknowledging the need for support, demonstrating good self-regulation and motivation.

options.text: Maybe, but she should have mentioned if she was overwhelmed earlier.
options.analysis: You deflected some responsibility back to Monica, showing strong motivation but lower empathy and perception.
